deploy.title: OpenClaw Docker Deployment Guide
deploy.subtitle: Deploy OpenClaw with Docker in minutes.
deploy.description: Use Docker to quickly deploy OpenClaw and get your AI Agent running in minutes.
deploy.step1Description: If you haven't installed Docker yet, please visit the Docker official website to download and install:
deploy.step1Check: After installation, make sure the Docker service is running
deploy.step2Description: Clone the OpenClaw repository to your local machine:
deploy.step2Check: After cloning, enter the project directory:
deploy.step3Description: Use Docker Compose to start all services with one command:
deploy.step3Check1: parameter means running the container in the background
deploy.step3Check2: The first startup will automatically download the required Docker images, please be patient
deploy.step3Check3: After successful startup, OpenClaw will continue to run in the background
deploy.successDescription: Congratulations! You have successfully deployed OpenClaw. Now you can start configuring your AI Agent and connecting to various platforms.
